body:
On the CL I suggested that @cbro change `Pizza` to `Phi`. The latter does exist in the `math` package.

@kytrinyx lint [does know about initialisms](https://github.com/golang/lint/blob/9bad2ac064ef73cba57dec90e67d45fec2ab67bc/lint.go#L719) but I don't think it approves of names that are _only_ an initialism. Maybe this should change. (@dsymonds?)
